embeddable.content:
This is a page with full width layout. This page contains:

  • a text box in the header that is displayed as a page intro
  • a multiple choice question in the header
  • a 2nd text box in the header at full width
  • a 3rd text box in the header not at full width
  • an interactive iframe in the interactive block
  • a multiple choice question in the info/assess section not at full width
  • an open response question in the info/asses section not at full width
  • a multiple choice question in the info/assess section at full width

embeddable.content: This is a second text block that appears in the header.  It should not be displayed as the page introduction, but should be displayed as all other text blocks are displayed.

embeddable.content: This is a third text block that appears in the header.  It should not be displayed as the page introduction, but should be displayed as all other text blocks are displayed.  It should NOT be displayed at full width.
embeddable.name: Third text block

embeddable.content:
This is a page with responsive layout.  This page contains:

  • A text box in the header section which should be displayed as a page introduction. 
  • The left, info/assessment section contains a text box, a multiple choice question, an open response question, and a library interactive with enable_learner_state set to true (so that it should get a question number and header). 
  • The right, interactive box section contains an iframe interactive with enable_learner_state set to true (so that it should get a question number and header).
  • A page sidebar.

embeddable.content:
This is a page with 60-40 layout. This page contains:

  • A text box in the header section which should be displayed as a page introduction. 
  • The left, info/assessment section contains a text box, a multiple choice question
  • The right, interactive box section contains a library interactive with enable_learner_state set to true (so that it should get a question number and header), a multiple choice question, and an open response question.

embeddable.content:
This is a page with 60-40 (interactive left) layout. This page contains:

  • A text box in the header section which should be displayed as a page introduction. 
  • The right, info/assessment section contains a text box, a multiple choice question
  • The left, interactive box section contains an interactive iframe with enable_learner_state set to false (so that it should NOT get a question number and header).
